title: Using EmbedJS for AI RAG systems in Node.js
snippet:
Live streamed on September 10, 2024.

Here are a few resources I created while I was playing around with EmbedJS for RAG:

RAG in Node.js with EmbedJS
- Blog: https://www.ashryan.io/rag-in-node-js-with-embedjs/
- Repo: https://github.com/ashryanbeats/embedjs-rag

Batch loading resources in EmbedJS for RAG
- Blog: https://www.ashryan.io/batch-loading-resources-in-embedjs-for-rag/
- Repo: https://github.com/ashryanbeats/embedjs-rag-web

You can get EmbedJS on GitHub here:
https://github.com/llm-tools/embedJs?ref=ashryan.io
author: meremortaldev
